Room.Name: Neilian Drive
Room.ShortDescription: You are walking along Neilian Drive, carefully watching your step around the high cliffs overlooking the river Othax just to the north.
Room.LongDescription: On the south side of the road, you can see a number of small shops in a rather large complex. You appear to be on the back side of the shops. The entrance to the complex is located one block to the west off of Avatar Boulevard.
